attributes.title: RISE FROM MEDIOCRE TO GENIUS! | 18 JULY 2021
attributes.description:
Rise from mediocre to genius!
The SPH in this discourse gives a strong reminder that becoming a genius is the fundamental nature of any Hindu. He gives an awakening clarion call to Hindus to wake up to their original nature. He sincerely blesses each one to awaken to seeking the conscious sovereignty, the truth; for being ferocious to reach the truth.

18 JUL 2021, SUNDAY (IST) - ENGLISH NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST
9:03 PM - THE SPH DARSHAN
SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
5TH DAY OF THE GURU PURNIMA BRAHMOTSAVAM. 
9:45 PM - 10:59 PM- NITHYANANDA SATSANG
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS THE SOURCE DECLARATION, THE CAUSE FOR UNMANIFEST TO MANIFEST.
*THE UNMANIFEST - PARAMASHIVA - WHEN IT STARTS MANIFESTING, THE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS THE SOURCE STEEL MIXED WITH BLISS. 
*BLISS IS THE LUBRICATION. CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS THE SOURCE ‘WILL’ THROUGH WHICH THE UNMANIFEST BECOMES MANIFEST.
*YESTERDAY I WAS TELLING, EVEN AN ATOM, CELL, ALL THESE ARE UNIT LEVEL EXISTENCE IN DIFFERENT FIELDS... IN BIOLOGY YOU CALL IT CELL, THE OUTER WORLD SCIENCE PERCEIVES MOLECULES, CELL, ATOM... ALL THIS IS FROM DIFFERENT EXTERNAL, RATIONAL, LOGICAL, ANALYTICAL MIND AND PERCEPTION.
*I AM TALKING FROM THE REVELATIONS OF THE GREATER COSMIC SCIENCE CALLED HINDUISM.
*IN THE COSMIC SCIENCE, THE UNIT OF EXISTENCE IS CALLED TATTVA.
*THE CORE TATTVA - UNIT OF EXISTENCE - THE UNMANIFEST - IS MORE THAN 99.99999%.
*THE OUTER WORLD MODERN SCIENCE AGREES THAT EVEN IN THE ATOM, THE UNMANIFEST VACUUM IS 99.99999%. ONLY A VERY SMALL EXISTENCE OF NEUTRONS AND PROTONS IS THERE.
*MODERN SCIENCE EXPLAINS FROM A DIFFERENT ANGLE. YOU LISTEN TO THE TRUTH FROM COSMIC SCIENCE.
*I WANT ALL OF YOU TO KNOW, IN THE MODERN SCIENCE, ANY UNIVERSITY HAS 30-40 OR SOME TOP UNIVERSITIES HAVE UP TO 300 DEPARTMENTS. BUT THE WHOLE DEPARTMENT CAN PRODUCE GENIUS ONLY IN THAT ONE DEPARTMENT, I SHOULD SAY KNOWLEDGEABLE.
READ MORE AT : https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/362033905289447
